sentence.Network_en: Nothing can ever take the place of real love and family togetherness.
sentence.Network_cn: 什么都不能取代真爱与家庭和睦。

sentence.Network_en: The difficulties have created a spirit of togetherness.
sentence.Network_cn: 危难造成了一种患难与共的精神.

sentence.Network_en: They hid the troubles plaguing their marriage behind a facade of family togetherness.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们将困扰婚姻的问题掩藏在家庭和睦的外表之下。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 钛族人的社会：钛族人的社会非常单一(homogenous)，充满了团结精神(togetherness)这一种族特质。这是钛族的力量来源之一。

entry.def: Togetherness is a happy feeling of affection and closeness to other people, especially your friends and family.

example.ex: Nothing can ever take the place of real love and family togetherness.
example.tran: 什么都不能取代真爱与家庭和睦。
